title: Tracking issue for RFC 2141: Add support to Cargo for alternative registries

labels.name: B-RFC-approved
labels.description: Approved by a merged RFC but not yet implemented.

labels.name: T-cargo
labels.description: Relevant to the cargo team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: C-tracking-issue
labels.description: Category: A tracking issue for an RFC or an unstable feature.

body:
This is a tracking issue for the RFC "Add support to Cargo for alternative registries" (rust-lang/rfcs#2141).

**Steps:**

- [x] Implement the `registries` key in `.cargo/config` and Cargo.toml - https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/pull/4506
- [x] Support login tokens for multiple registries - https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/pull/4680
- [ ] [Add a command to generate registry index data](https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/issues/4497)
- [ ] Allow renaming crates in the dependencies section - https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/issues/1311 (also necessary for [RFC 2126: Clarify and streamline paths and visibility](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/44660))
- [x] [`path` and `registry` shouldn't be mutually exclusive in dependency configurations](https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/issues/4843) - https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/pull/4844
- [ ] Track which commands a registry supports in its config.json - https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/pull/4747
- [x] Make .cargo/credentials a subset of .cargo/config - https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/pull/4839
- [ ] [What is the significance of "specification" of index format/API?](https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/issues/4574)
- [ ] [Areas requiring agreement for stabilization of alternative registries](https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/issues/4688)
- [ ] Adjust documentation ([see instructions on forge][doc-guide])
- [ ] Stabilization PR ([see instructions on forge][stabilization-guide])

[stabilization-guide]: https://forge.rust-lang.org/stabilization-guide.html
[doc-guide]: https://forge.rust-lang.org/stabilization-guide.html#updating-documentation

**Unresolved questions:**

- Are the names of everything what we want?
  - `cargo generate-index-metadata`?
  - `registry = my-registry`?
  - `publish-registries = []`?

- What kinds of authentication parameters do we need to support in `.cargo/credentials`?
